text_block_list.text: Today I have a training session with<n>Meisho Doto, but...

She's not the type to skip practice, so<n>it's likely that she's
had another of<n>her accidents. I decide to go look for<n>her.

I search around for the better part of<n>an hour before I finally
spot the<n>shivering, muddy figure in front of the<n>flower
beds.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Ohhhh... Urgggh... Pat... pat... pat...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Eep! Ah... T-Trainer?!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Ah! W-well, um... I suppose this was<n>unavoidable... given
what happened.<n>It's kind of a long story...
choice_data_list: Tell me after you get changed!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: O-okay!

Together, we wash her muddied<n>jersey and hang it out to
dry. While<n>we wait, I ask her to explain what<n>happened.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Well, I-I thought I'd do some solo<n>training before our
session today, so...<n>I went for a jog.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
B-but I slipped and fell, and while I<n>was trying to recover, I
ended up<n>falling right into the flower bed...
choice_data_list: So that's why you were covered in mud...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Yes... Ah, b-but at least I landed in a<n>spot where there were
no flowers or<n>other plants!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
However, my fall left the impression<n>of my body in the soil,
so I was<n>pat-pat-patting it in... when you found<n>me...
choice_data_list: Well, that explains why you were late.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Eep! I-I'm sorry... You must be<n>furious...

She has a reason for her tardiness,<n>so I'm actually not that
mad about it.<n>However...
choice_data_list:
I wish you would've told me you were doing
solo training.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Huh? B-but if you joined me... then it<n>wouldn't be solo
training.
choice_data_list: I'd still like to give you advice.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Th-that's okay. It's just something I<n>do from time to time... I
don't want to<n>bother you any more than I already<n>do...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I-I mean... My clumsiness caused me<n>to be late today, and
it's interrupted<n>our training before, right?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Like the time I tried to organize your<n>files and erased all our
training<n>records, or when I tried to help<n>prepare the course
and ran myself<n>over with the turf roller...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Or the time I covered you in sand, or<n>when I spilled the
water all over you...<n>And the incident with the towel and<n>
the zipper and the explosion and the—

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: No, you don't!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
I've caused so, so much trouble for<n>you... I don't want to
take up any<n>more of your time than I already do!

It's true that her clumsiness is out of<n>this world, but she
always takes<n>responsibility for any tardiness or<n>other
issues it causes. Besides...
I'm her trainer. She's supposedto take up my time. In fact, as long asit's for her growth, I'd be more than happy to help.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: AAAAAHHHHH!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: M-m-my jersey! It's flying away!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Ah! When I hung up my jersey, I<n>angled it so that the wind
would hit it<n>more! I-I thought that would help it dry<n>faster,
not make it fly away! I-I need to<n>catch it!

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Ah! E-excuse me, sorr—Ugyah?!<n>Sorry, sorry, sorry! C-come
back,<n>jersey!

Before I can stop her, Doto dashes<n>out of the room,
stumbling over chairs<n>and tables along the way.

How do I help her understand that<n>it's okay to "bother" me?
I<n>contemplate that question as I chase<n>after the frantic
Meisho Doto.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Jerseyyy, slow dooown!<n>Pleeeeas—Oof!
